alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 10:47AM MST until January 18 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches, with locally higher amounts in the Ogden Valley. * WHERE...Cache Valley/Utah Portion, Wasatch Back, and Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Wasatch Back
